title: Volvo Introduces The EX30: A Compact Electric SUV For The Masses - CleanTechnica
summary: Volvo introduces the new EX30, a fully electric compact SUV, with different range options and sustainable design features including recycled materials.
green_innovation: TRUE. This is green innovation as Volvo is moving towards selling only fully electric vehicles, aiming to bring premium electric mobility to a broader audience to advance full electrification.
business_innovation: FALSE. The article focuses on the new product, the Volvo EX30, and its sustainability features rather than significant differences in business processes.
green_product: TRUE. The Volvo EX30 is designed as a fully electric vehicle with sustainable materials, energy-efficient systems, and functionalities supporting low environmental impact throughout its lifecycle.
green_process: FALSE. The article highlights sustainable design and materials used in the production of the Volvo EX30 but does not detail specific processes implemented.
likely_naics_codes: Likely NAICS Codes: 336111 - Automobile Manufacturing, 336112 - Light Truck and Utility Vehicle Manufacturing, 336991 - Motorcycle, Bicycle, and Parts Manufacturing, 336399 - All Other Motor Vehicle Parts Manufacturing
greenwashing: FALSE. The article provides detailed information about the sustainability features of the Volvo EX30, demonstrating a genuine commitment to environmentally friendly design rather than greenwashing.
